meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Laurie Russell Roy Marcus Yael Sofaer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #977.

td.p: Laurie Russell, a reservation agent from Orlando, Florida
Roy Marcus, a product development manager originally from Bayside, New York
Yael Sofaer, a programmer & analyst originally from Israel (whose 3-day cash winnings total $35,001)

tr.td: STARTS & ENDS WITH "O"
STATE CAPITALS
THE OLYMPICS
COINS
RAGTIME & BLUES
THE KENNEDY WOMEN
